articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Asia is in the midst of a space race, but it's not just about exploration. It's also a military flex - ABC News
articles.description: The pool of countries deploying huge amounts of cash as part of a new space race is growing larger. But experts fear this could be a sign of a new arms race, too.
articles.content:
The space race has never purely been about planting a nation's flag on an object in space or benign scientific discovery.
It's always had a military and strategic dimension.

articles.title: India delivers 1 billion COVID-19 vaccine doses as health officials hope worst of pandemic has passed - CBC.ca
articles.description: India has administered one billion doses of COVID-19 vaccine, officials said Thursday, passing a milestone for the South Asian country where the delta variant fuelled its first crushing surge earlier this year.
